name: Iconic Lip Shaper Liner
about: What it is:A soft and gliding lip pencil formula designed to give lips contour and shape..Formulation Type:Lip Liner.Ingredient Callouts:Free of parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, sulfates SLS & SLES, triclocarban, triclosan, and contains less than one percent synthetic fragrance. It is also vegan and cruelty-free..What Else You Need to Know:The sharpenable precision tip smoothly lines and fills lips with saturated color that adds contrast and boosts wear to your favorite lipstick or lip-gloss color.
ingredients: Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Mica, Bis-Diglyceryl Polyacyladipate-2, Hydrogenated Olive Oil Myristyl Esters, C10-18 Triglycerides, Polyethylene, Hydrogenated Cottonseed Oil, Hydrogenated Olive Oil Decyl Esters, Candelilla Cera/Euphorbia Cerifera, (Candelilla) Wax/Cire de Candelilla, Cera Carnauba/Copernicia Cerifera (Carnauba) Wax/Cire de Carnauba, Tocopherol, Ascorbyl Palmitate. May Contain/Peut Contenir (±): CI 77891 (Titanium Dioxide), CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499 (Iron Oxides), CI 15850 (Red 6), CI 45410 (Red 28), CI 42090 (Blue 1 Lake).
how_to_use: Deeper tones can be applied to contrast a lighter lipstick or lip gloss color, while a matching shade can be applied to naturally.shape and contour lips while improving the wear of color.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: My go to lip liner!! I haven't touched another lip liner since I started using this one and it never disappoints !! It's very pigmented and great for darker complexions as well !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is a stable in my makeup routine. I keep it in my purse at all times. So smooth and long lasting. No need to reapply 50 times a day. I do wish I came with a sharpener which is why I gave it 4 stars instead of 5

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I am sharing my honest and authentic opinion, as a Sephora Beauty Insider Community Ambassador. This is a wonderful formula. It is not too drying and not too creamy to make such a wonderfully pigmented and long-lasting liner. I have 2 of these, and I love the classic pencil format. I like to pair this shade with a pink shade or tinted lip balm.

reviews.review_title: Too dry for me, but a great color.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great color but I don't do well with a dry pencil. I have to have a liner that is easy to put on my dry lips. This doesn't work for me.

So I knew about absolutely nothing about the brand Fashion Fair Cosmetics and I know that sounds really bad but I honestly didn't and I was actually looking at the Danessa Myrick's  Cosmetics section, which I absolutely love and saw the Fashion Fair right beside it. I was very interested in the lip liners they had, especially the darkest brown shade which is Hickory Brown. I love the liner, especially the shade because it's I feel like it's THE dark brown that me, being a medium brown skin tone, yellow and gold under tone, really needs. LOVE

reviews.review_title: A new staple!! A must have!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing liner !! A deep rich brown, smooth on a matte kind of finish but not dry .!! Compares if not better than Jeff from Makeup by Mario and Coin Collector by One Size both great but Hickory Brown is that girly !!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful fuchsia shade, glides on s￼o nice, non drying, long lasting.
